divs: Sighting Detailswere traveling home(north west),it was a clear and near dusk. Noticed the onlystar in the sky was far off and yellowish-white in color.watch light remainderor ride(5mins). Seemed to be getting closer.pulled into yard,ran into house toget binoculars.Back outside to find light had dissapeared. Sec. later alarge,dark triangle floated over barn at rooftop height.passed overdriveway.could see gurder type structuring underneath and white lights incenter and corners. Object slowly floated over trees and away towards the southeast. appeared to be very thin, a single row of small darker colored squaresseen along entire side that was visible.ENTER YOUR NARRATIVE DESCRIPTION HERE(you can type over these instructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words(equivalent to 1 typed page).
